General.Name: Lao Feng Xiang Co Ltd B
General.Description: Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. operates in the jewelry industry in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company researches, designs, produces, and sells gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, jade, pearls, gold inlays, colored gemstones, enamel, red coral, and other jewelry, as well as K gold glasses, and craft travel souvenirs. The company was formerly known as China First Pencil Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. in July 2009. Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1848 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

5.Name: Mr. Fu Liang  Zhou
